page.title: 17An 11 Year Old's Weekend
page.content: At weekends I usually stay in bed till about 8:30.We are not in a hurry so we have a fried egg and bacon brekfast.On Saturday morning we tidy up and go by car to shop at the Superstore.Mum loads the trolley but I push it.Before going home we have a drink and ice cream in the restaurant.I play in the garden or the park with my friend in the afternoon.I watch T.V.in the evening and go to bed about 10:30.On Sunday morning I like to go fishing near the harbour.Last week I caught 2 pout whiting.Sunday dinner is a roast with potatoes and beans from our garden.Sometimes I water the garden for Dad.In the afternoon we go to Grandma and Granddad's for tea and a nice drive to the seafront or Beachy Head.We take my grandparents back then go home.I watch T.V.till 8:30 then go to bed because of school next day.
